title: Match Benefits section mobile size and placement to provided screenshot

requirements.text: Update the mobile layout of the Benefits section (frontend/src/components/sections/BenefitsSection.tsx) so its sizing and element placement match the provided reference screenshot (image-14.png). This includes mobile typography scale, spacing (section padding, header block spacing, inter-card spacing), and benefit-card layout (2-column grid on mobile with icon, title, and description aligned/positioned as shown).

quotes: this is the size and placement i need for mobile view.

acceptanceCriteria: On a small mobile viewport (e.g., 375px width), the Benefits section visually matches image-14.png for: (1) section heading and intro paragraph sizing and vertical spacing, (2) a 2x2 benefit grid with consistent gaps and centered alignment, (3) icon container size/shape and spacing above titles, (4) readable text sizes with no overflow or awkward wrapping.
On md+ breakpoints, the existing responsive intent is preserved (2 columns at md, 4 columns at lg) without regressions.
No changes are made to backend code.

constraints: Edit only app-owned components; do not modify any files under frontend/src/components/ui or other immutable paths.
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Adding new sections or changing the Benefits section marketing copy.
Backend changes, data persistence, or authentication changes.
